A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Something just so off about the movie. On the surface it looks and sounds like Star Wars\, but really goes downhill after a solid first act. 
Feels like a rough draft of the original New Hope version back when it was called "Adventures of Luke Starkiller as taken from the Journal of the Whills."
Pros: Kylo Ren's arc was intereting. Daisy Ridley does a solid job along with Oscar Isaac with what they were given. Force powers expanded\, solid first act to the story.
Cons: Too many plot devices & pointless actions. More than a few plot holes that go beyond space western suspension of disbelief. More depressing than fun when everything settles.
